channel.title: Top Crypto News – Jun 12, 2025
channel.description: Top 10+ most-viewed or highest-rated crypto news (~24–36 h) with summaries, creator credits, and UTM‑tagged links.

item.title: Bitcoin Sentiment Hits 7-Month High as BTC Flirts with $112K
item.description: Social media sentiment for Bitcoin has surged to a seven-month high as BTC approaches its all‑time highs near $112K, driven by increasing retail interest :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}.
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph

item.title: Trident Digital Plans $500M XRP Treasury Acquisition
item.description: Trident Digital from Singapore is seeking to raise $500 million to incorporate XRP as a core treasury asset, signaling increased institutional adoption :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}.
item.dc:creator: Shaurya Malwa / CoinDesk

item.title: Most Viewed Coins on CoinGecko: aura, Resolv, SPX6900
item.description: CoinGecko's most‑viewed tokens in the last 24 hours are aura, Resolv, and SPX6900, highlighting current community interest :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}.
item.dc:creator: CoinGecko
